text: Khloe Kardashian got the giggles during her sister Kim's somber acceptance speech at the People's Choice Awards on Sunday night over her mother Kris Jenner's ridiculous sunglasses. In a look usually reserved for gangsta rappers, the 63 - year - old momager opted to wear huge shades inside the star - studded LA event and served an intense face to match.'You and your glasses': Khloe Kardashian couldn't contain her amusement during Kim's somber acceptance speech at the People's Choice Awards on Sunday night over her mother's ridiculous sunglasses Giggles : The reality star burst out laughing and tried to stifle her chuckles while Kim discussed the California wildfires The moment came when Kim Kardashian was dedicating the
